I just talked to Panzertron over IM (he's the bot in charge of the Iron 
Fist), and he said that he can no longer keep up. He has two jobs and is 
taking colledge corses online. He asked me if I could take over his character 
and have him die a grusoume, terrible death. You guys can email him if you 
want.

::Zardus/Panzertron/Reptilica::

Zardus' comp beeps, the Alliance commander looking down at it. It was a 
transmission from Panzertron.

"Zardus," it read, "I want you to meet me at the Iron Fist. I think its time 
to strengthen the treaty between the Alliance and the Militron."

Zardus nods. "I'll be right there," he says, walking off toward the exit.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Reptilica nods at Burning Hammer. "Allright, then, so you won't be fighting 
any battles?"
